Text:
Oh wow. Thank you so much for this!

I first read Asterix in Portuguese (grew up in Brazil), a lot of the original humor translates much better into Portuguese than it does into English. Someday I hope to have the full set in Portuguese so I can scan it and share it on TPB. Cheers!
This is a brilliant torrent! Thanks a lot! Thanks to your good torrent, I will SEED forever! And it englisk too!
